qas.question: What has caused several uncommon arrangements between the various states in the United Kingdom?
What type of citizenship can Northern Ireland people have?

answers.text: choice of Irish or British citizenship or both

qas.question: The 1998 Good Friday Agreement resulted in what arrangement?

answers.text: policies common across the island of Ireland

qas.question: The Northern Ireland Executive meets with what other government to develop policies for the island of Ireland?

plausible_answers.text: Republic of Ireland, Northern Ireland and the United Kingdom

qas.question: The Northern Atlantic Peace Process involves arrangements between which kingdoms?
What was made following the Black Friday Agreement of what year?
What type of arrangements has the Northern Ireland Executive led to between the Republic of Ireland, Northern ireland and the UK?

plausible_answers.text: Irish or British citizenship or both

qas.question: What type of citizenship are people from Britain entitled to?
The Northern Ireland Executive and what other entity meet as the East/West Ministerial Council?

context: <a0_0>The Northern Ireland Peace Process<a0_0/> has led to a number of <b6_0>unusual<b6_0/> arrangements between the <b4_0>Republic of Ireland, Northern Ireland and the United Kingdom<b4_0/>. For example, citizens of Northern Ireland are entitled to the <a1_0>choice of <b7_0>Irish or British citizenship or both<b7_0/><a1_0/> and the Governments of Ireland and the United Kingdom consult on matters not devolved to the Northern Ireland Executive. The Northern Ireland Executive and the <a3_0><b8_0>Government of Ireland<b8_0/><a3_0/> also meet as the North/South Ministerial Council to develop <a2_0>policies common across the island of Ireland<a2_0/>. These <b5_0>arrangements<b5_0/> were made following the 1998 Good Friday Agreement.
